title: Hour 2: Name A Guardian
description:
Greg Cote doesn't like Christopher Columbus or black beans. Then, good ties vs. bad ties, a Davante Adams job swap, and analyzing the Draymond Green-Jordan Poole fight now that we have the leaked video of Draymond's punch. Plus, Stugotz's Weekend Observations!
